text: 1:17 Matyu 3:171:17-18 Matyu 17:1-5; Mak 9:2-7; Luk 9:28-35Ezɨ God Afeziam ziar ekiam a ganɨngi, egha angazangarir aghuir kam gamizɨma an an oto. Ezɨ God uabɨ uan Nguibamɨn ikia angazangarir ekiar kamɨn aven ikiava kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kar nan Otarim, kɨ bar a gifonge, egha kɨ a bagha bar akonge.”
